text: warslna 'iilaa "mdyn" 'akhahum sheybana, fqal: ya qawm aebuduu allah whdh, lays lakum min 'ilh yastahiqu alebadt ghyrh jl wela, fakhlsu lah alebadt, wala tanqusuu alnnas huquqahum fi mkayylhm wmwazynhm, 'iiniy 'arakum fi saeat eysh, wa'iiniy 'akhaf ealaykum -bsbb 'inqas almikyal walmyzan- eadhab yawm yhyt bkm
